sourcesContent:
Confirm delete operation

Are you sure you want to delete this Email Template?

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgbActiveModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; import { EventManager } from 'app/core/util/event-manager.service'; import { IEmailTemplate } from './email-template.model'; import { EmailTemplateService } from './email-template.service'; @Component({ selector: 'ic-email-template-delete-dialog', templateUrl: './email-template-delete-dialog.component.html', }) export class EmailTemplateDeleteDialogComponent { emailTemplate?: IEmailTemplate; constructor( protected emailTemplateService: EmailTemplateService, public activeModal: NgbActiveModal, protected eventManager: EventManager ) {} clear(): void { this.activeModal.dismiss(); } confirmDelete(id: number): void { this.emailTemplateService.delete(id).subscribe(() => { this.eventManager.broadcast('emailTemplateListModification'); this.activeModal.close(); }); } }
